sect1.title: Zym_Paginate_Array
sect1.para: Both numeric and associative arrays can be paginated using the Zym_Paginate_Array class. Setting up a Zym_Paginate_Array instance is pretty straight forward:
sect1.programlisting: $data = range(1,100); // Create an array containing the numbers 1 to 100. $paginate = new Zym_Paginate_Array($data); $paginate->setRowLimit(15); // I want to show 15 items per page. Setting this is optional, it will default to 10. $page3 = $paginate->getPage(3); // Get page 3
